Directions: In a small microwave-safe bowl, combine the orange juice, preserves, allspice, salt, pepper and ginger. Microwave, uncovered, on high for 1 to 1-1/2 minutes or until preserves begin to melt; stir to blend.
Place the rice in a shallow 3-qt. microwave-safe dish; arrange chicken on top. Pour sauce over chicken and rice. Cover and refrigerate for 4 hours.
Cover and microwave at 80% power for 15-20 minutes or until chicken juices run clear and the rice is tender.
Ingredients: 6 boneless skinless chicken breast halves (1-1/2 pounds)
